description: Try our easy to follow Refried Beans recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Refried Beans Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800g black beans, drained with liquid reserved
0.5 red chile, seeded, if desired, and chopped (to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the lard or vegetable oil in a large skillet, add the onion and cook for 5-10 minutes, until golden. Add the garlic and cook for another 1 minute.
Meanwhile, put the black beans and 2 tablespoons of the reserved bean liquid in a food processor or blender and blend until smooth.

Add the pureed beans and oregano to the onion mixture, reduce the heat to low and cook for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Add 1/2 cup of the reserved bean liquid and cook for another 5 minutes, until the beans are the consistency of very soft mashed potatoes.
Season, sprinkle with the cheese, and serve garnished with the coriander and chile.
